title: handler
extract: Animal handler, person who conducts animal training or is a wrangler. Handler, a sport coach, agent or promoter. Agent handling, person who manages a spy or agent of organizations in conflict such as nations and even groups and gangs involved in crusades, jihad, mass organized conversion rackets, etc.
